name: Ecchi Cards
description: This game is a casual Cards game where you battle your cards against opponent's deck.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000, Shader Model 3.0, 512 MB Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
